Installation

The package can be installed from PyPI using pip:

$ pip install yatte

The only run-time dependency is Python itself.

Note: It has only been tested on Linux so far, but it should work on other platforms. Please let me know on the mailing list if you run into any issues.

Tab completion

To get tab-completion of tasks for the Fish shell, copy completions/yatte.fish from the source code repository to your Fish completions folder (~/.config/fish/completions/ on Linux).
